digest:
- *Integrating Artificial Intelligence into Operating Systems* surveys AI integration in OS, highlighting techniques and challenges. Read more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2407.14567
- *Motif 2 12.7B technical report* introduces a new efficient language model with innovative architecture. More details: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07464
- *Towards Outcome-Oriented, Task-Agnostic Evaluation of AI Agents* proposes 11 outcome-based metrics for AI evaluation. Explore further: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08242
- *ControlMed: Adding Reasoning Control to Medical Language Model* enhances medical LLMs for clinical efficiency. Discover more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.22545
- *AgentFlux: Decoupled Fine-Tuning & Inference for On-Device Agentic Systems* improves task automation with on-device LLMs. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00229
- *SpeechJudge: Towards Human-Level Judgment for Speech Naturalness* enhances speech synthesis alignment with human perception. Read here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07931
- *FedSEA-LLaMA: A Secure, Efficient and Adaptive Federated Splitting Framework* enhances federated learning for LLMs. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.15683
- *Quantizing Whisper-small: How design choices affect ASR performance* improves deployment efficiency on edge devices. More info: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08093
- *How Hungry is AI? Benchmarking Energy, Water, and Carbon Footprint of LLM Inference* reveals high resource consumption, offering a sustainability framework. Details: https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.09598
- *AI vs. the cheating: lessons from building a national exam integrity system* reveals an industrialized cheating network, improving exam integrity. Read more: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45898498
- *The Other 80%: What Productivity Really Means* critiques AI's impact on developer productivity, emphasizing holistic software development. Explore: https://www.oreilly.com/radar/the-other-80-what-productivity-really-means/
